item.title: About
item.description:
MeisamEb

Vulnerability Researcher
Reverse Engineering · Exploit Development · Fuzzing · Malware Analysis

This site documents my technical research, exploit development notes, reverse engineering write-ups, and security experiments — primarily focused on Windows user-mode and kernel-mode components.

Focus Areas

  • Windows exploit development (user & kernel mode)
  • Reverse engineering of binaries, drivers, and system components
  • Fuzzing
  • Vulnerability research and patch diffing
  • Shellcode, loaders, and evasion techniques

Notes

  • All content is for educational and research purposes
  • Code and techniques are shared to advance understanding, not misuse

item.title: CVE-2025-0288
item.description: Comprehensive analysis of CVE-2025-0288 affecting biontdrv.sys — exploit details, impact, affected versions, and mitigation guidance.
